metadata.title: CVE-2018-10195 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
lrzsz before version 0.12.21~rc can leak information to the receiving sidedue to an incorrect length check in the function zsdata that causes asize_t to wrap around.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzsz - 0.12.21-10~build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzsz package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.21-10~build0.18.04.1').
